EmailTemplate.description: Notification sent to the running User when a GRAX Schedule process finishes with Error
EmailTemplate.name: GRAX Schedule Process Error Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: GRAX Schedule Process Has Completed with Error
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.FirstName},
The GRAX Schedule Process, {!grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__c.grax__Name__c}, has completed with a status of "{!grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__c.grax__Status__c}" within the Salesforce Environment: {!Organization.Name}, with the Organization ID of: {!Organization.Id}.
Click {!grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__c.Link} for details on this process. This page will have a field "GRAX Error Report Link" with more information.
